name: capacitor production, for surface-mounting | capacitor, for surface-mounting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4555/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of SMD type capacitors for the surface mounting technology. It is based on the assumption that a typical SMD type capacitor in electronic modules has an average weight of 0.086 g.The data represent a typical SMD type capacitor for surface mounting, used in the information and communication technology. Material data are taken from datasheets of producers of such capacitors and from the literature. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions. The production efforts represent not a specific capacitor type and have thus, accordingly higher uncertainties.

From reception of metals and plastics at the factory gate.

This dataset includes raw material input and production efforts for the production of currently used SMD capacitors for surface mounting technology.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable composition of SMD type capacitors.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: average production composed of: formulation; build-up process; cutting; bisquing; Pre-Firing; Firing; Tumbling; Termination (SMT) resp. metallization; slitting; winding; metal spray; heat treatment; sawing; lead welding; epoxy filling (THT)

exchanges.description:
SMD type capacitors offer maximum capacitance within the smallest space, and hence, can be found in many areas of advanced microelectronics for instance information, entertainment, automotive, and industrial electronics.
EcoSpold01Location=GLO

flow.name: capacitor, for surface-mounting
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Calculated Value. The production of 1 kg of capacitors lead to a waste amount of 0.48 kg unused raw materials. Hence, this dataset here has an input of 1.48 kg of raw materials per kg of capacitor. The split to the different raw materials (metals, plastics, etc.) is based on the reported  material specifications.

Further references
ZVEI (2006) Umbrella Specs. Download of December 21 from <http://www.zvei.org/index.php?id=1158>.

Venkel (2006) Material Composition - MLCCs. Download of December 12 from <http://www.venkel.com/FinalPDFs/Matl_composition.pdf>.
